doc:
André the Giant https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andr%C3%A9_the_Giant 0 André René Roussimoff (May 19, 1946 – January 27, 1993), best known as André the Giant, was a French professional wrestler and actor.He famously feuded with Hulk Hogan, culminating at WrestleMania III in 1987. His best-remembered film role was that of Fezzik, the giant in The Princess Bride. His size was a result of gigantism caused by excess growth hormone, which later resulted in acromegaly. It also led to his being called "The Eighth Wonder of the World".In the World Wrestling Federation (WWF, now known as WWE), André was a one-time WWF World Heavyweight Champion and a one-time WWF Tag Team Champion. In 1993, André was the first ever wrestler to be inducted into the WWE Hall of Fame class of 1993. André_René_Roussimoff ( May_19_,_1946 – January_27_,_1993 ) , best_known as André the_Giant , was a_French_professional_wrestler_and_actor.He famously feuded with Hulk_Hogan , culminating at WrestleMania_III in 1987 . His_best-remembered_film_role was that of Fezzik , the_giant in The_Princess_Bride . His_size was a_result of gigantism caused by excess_growth_hormone , which later resulted in acromegaly . It also led to his being_called " The_Eighth_Wonder of the_World_" . In the_World_Wrestling_Federation_(_WWF , now_known as WWE_) , André was a_one-time_WWF_World_Heavyweight_Champion and a_one-time_WWF_Tag_Team_Champion . In 1993 , André was the_first_ever_wrestler to_be_inducted into the_WWE_Hall of Fame_class of 1993 .
